Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product is truly a masterpiece, offering unparalleled functionality and quality. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its worth to us and its potential value to you, we are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. We're confident this price not only represents a fantastic opportunity for you but also ensures a fair return on our investment. Should you decide to proceed, we're here to assist you every step of the way. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
